name: Widget4Call
author: APIdaze

sections.description:
Widget4Call is a Click to Call and a Web Call Back solution which allows yours customers to easily and freely contact you on the phone.

You can easily add a call button in your WordPress website. Yours customers don’t need to install any software. You receive calls on your phone, don’t need to insatll software.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip and put the plugin folder into [wordpress_dir]/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. If don’t already have a Widget4Call account, go to https://w4c.widget4call.fr/fr and create a new account
  4. Then go to https://w4c.widget4call.fr/fr/profil and note your API KEY
  5. Go to the ‘Widget4Call’ menu and set the API KEY you previously note.
  6. Create your widget and then copy/paste the shortcode it to your posts and/or pages
